game.name: Cloudspan
game.categories: Single-player, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this bite-sized city builder, your goal is to stack and stretch your town as far as physics will allow. Tiny Island. Big mess.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this bite-sized city builder, your goal is to stack and stretch your town as far as physics will allow. Tiny Island. Big mess.
